ModMetaData.name: Helmet Hoarder Great War
ModMetaData.description:
This Mod includes 22 apparel items from ww1: 3 Face Masks, 2 Armors and 17 Helmets. All Helmets existed and were used historically. For more information on them, visit my sources (You will probably need to translate most pages):
German Equipment: - Stahlhelm M16,M17,M18: http://humanbonb.free.fr/indexCasqueall.html (Fre) - Stirnpanzer (Browplate), Sappenpanzer (Lobster Armor), Sappenpanzer Gesichtsmaske, Gaede Helmet: http://humanbonb.free.fr/indexProtegesfaciauxall.html (Fre) - Pickelhaube: https://www.preussen1988.de/html/Preussenerlaeuterungen/Die%20Geschichte%20der%20Pickelhaube.htm (Ger) Austro-Hungarian Equipment: - Berndorfer, Berndorfer Browplate: https://maplecreekmilitaria.com/2022/03/19/austro-hungarian-berndorfer/ (Eng) Italian Equipment: - Farina Helmet: https://www.cimeetrincee.it/elmofari.htm (Ita) - Farina Armor: https://www.cimeetrincee.it/farina.htm (Ita) French Equipment: - Adrian, French Skullcap: http://humanbonb.free.fr/indexCasquefr.html (Fre) - Adrian Browplate,Adrian Polack Visor: http://humanbonb.free.fr/indexProtegesfaciauxfr.html (Fre) British Equipment: - Brodie: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brodie_helmet (Eng) Russian Equipment: - Sohlberg Shovelsteel M17: https://maplecreekmilitaria.com/2022/03/12/russian-m17/ (Eng)
